title: easyLogin
commands.login.failure: password error or you logged in a wrong account %1$s
commands.email.bind.failure: failed to bind email to current account
commands.email.bind.success: confirm code has been sent to your account
commands.password.recover.success: you can now login through temp password %s
commands.password.confirm.failure: the confirm password aren't consistent with previous one
account.already_loggedin: you have already logged in as %s
